topics.body:
That moment when you can sing a song you haven't heard in years word for word and remember it perfectly:

!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131118234932/brittany-s-pierce/images/7/76/Singing.gif!
~_When you walk away you don't hear me say, "Please, oh baby, don't go."  Simple and clean is the way that you're making me feel tonight.  It's hard to let it go.  You're giving me too many things lately, you're all I need.  You smiled at me and said, "Don't get me wrong, I love you, but does that mean I have to meet your father?"  When we are older you'll understand what I meant when I said, "No, I don't think life is quite that simple"  The daily things that keep us all busy are confusing me.  That's when you came to me and said, "Wish I could prove I love you, but does that mean I have to walk on water?"  When we are older you'll understand it's enough when I say so and maybe some things are that simple.  Hold me; whatever lies beyond this morning is a little later on regardless of warning the future doesn't scare me at all nothing's like before.  Hold me; whatever lies beyond this morning is a little later on regardless of warning the future doesn't scare me at all nothing's like before.  Hold me; whatever lies beyond this morning is a little later on regardless of warning the future doesn't scare me at all nothing's like before._~
